General.Name: Gold Resource Corp.
General.Description: Gold Resource Corporation engages in the exploration, development, and production of gold and silver projects in Mexico and the United States. The company explores for copper, lead, and zinc deposits. Its principal asset is the 100% owned Back Forty project covering approximately 1,304 hectares located in Menominee county, Michigan. Gold Resource Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.
General.Address: 7900 East Union Avenue, Denver, CO, United States, 80237
